original_title: Teshumara, les guitares de la rébellion Touareg
overview: This film is a beautiful musical documentary about a key band of Touareg music: Tinariwen. They represent Touareg rock, a mix between a sharp BB King and frantic muezzins. It is a cry for uprising, wandering, love, a nomadic blues popular outside Mali's frontiers. It is the new Touareg culture.
title: Teshumara, les guitares de la rébellion Touareg
